TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 控件中选中项（包括处于不确定状态的项）的集合。

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of checked items, including items in an indeterminate state, in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Checked items 集合是控件中所有项的子集 ; 它只包含处于选中状态或不确定状态的项。The checked items collection is a subset of all items in the control; it contains only those items that are in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控件中项的索引集合的示例， (控件中包含的所有项) 。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象1object 1|| |11|对象2object 2|| |22|对象3object 3|| |33|对象4object 4|| |44|对象5object 5|| 根据前面的示例，下表显示了选中项的索引集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|对象2object 2| |11|对象4object 4| |22|对象5object 5| 类有两个成员，可用于访问存储的索引、 属性和 方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 根据前面的示例，对参数值为1的属性的调用将 返回对象4。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns object 4. 使用对象4的参数对的调用返回值1。A call to with a parameter of object 4 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例对中的选中项 进行枚举，以查看项所在的检查状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用 方法设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 该示例还演示了如何使用 属性来获取 ，并使用 属性来获取 。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 如果给定项的索引，则第一个循环使用 方法获取 每个选中项的。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用 ，但使用 方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将所选索引从多个集合合并到一个数组中。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

summary.span: 返回选中项集合中的一个索引。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是集合中对象的子集 ，只表示已选中的项。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only items that are checked. 此集合按升序排序。This collection is ordered in ascending order.
